item.description:
A movie must see: the devastating revelation of what America might look like after four more years of Obama! Immersed in exotic locales across four continents, best selling author Dinesh D'Souza races against time to find answers to Obama's past and reveal where America will be in 2016. During this journey he discovers how Hope and Change became radically misunderstood, and identifies new flashpoints for hot wars in mankind's greatest struggle. The journey moves quickly over the arc of the old colonial empires, into America's empire of liberty, and we see the unfolding realignment of nations and the shape of the global future. 1hr 29 min. Director: Dinesh D'Souza - Cast: Dr. Paul Vitz, Dr. Alice Dewey, Dr. Paul Kengor, Willy Kauai, George Obama (Barack's half brother).

Trailer at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wUjAcK7KHvA.

At 7:00 we walk to theatre for the 7:20 showing. AMC LOEWS Boston 19, 175 Tremont Street. Order ticket ($12) in advance to assure entrance (+$1.25 service charge):

https://www.fandango.com/transaction/ticketing/redvines/ticketboxoffice.aspx?row_count=0&date=8%2f24%2f2012&mid=157117&tid=AAPNV

6:00 to 7:00 Let's meetup first for a bite and brew at Silvertone Bar,
69 Bromfield St. (bet. Tremont & Washington Sts.). www.silvertonedowntown.com.

After movie gathering at other nearby location.

If you don't want to take in the movie, consider coming for the social hour at 6:00.

Thurman Smith 781-729-3832 / cell 617-571-3740   www.efrllc.com
item.how_to_find_us: I will commandeer a table in the dinning area, or will be at the bar
item.name: See "2016" the movie
